mapper.select: select * from place where place_name like concat('%', #{param2}, '%') order by place_seq desc limit #{param1.displayRow} offset #{param1.startNum}
select * from hotel where hotel_name like concat('%', #{param2}, '%') order by hotel_seq desc limit #{param1.displayRow} offset #{param1.startNum}
mapper.insert: insert into place(place_name, place_location, place_description, place_image, savefilename)values(#{place_name},#{place_location},#{place_description},#{place_image},#{savefilename})
mapper.select: update place set place_name=#{place_name}, place_location=#{place_location}, place_description=#{place_description}, place_image=#{place_image}, savefilename=#{savefilename} where place_seq=#{place_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into hotel(hotel_name, hotel_location, hotel_description, hotel_image, hotel_savefilename)values(#{hotel_name},#{hotel_location},#{hotel_description},#{hotel_image},#{hotel_savefilename})
mapper.select: update hotel set hotel_name=#{hotel_name}, hotel_location=#{hotel_location}, hotel_description=#{hotel_description}, hotel_image=#{hotel_image}, hotel_savefilename=#{hotel_savefilename} where hotel_seq=#{hotel_seq}
